channel.title: Homeworld on Derme's Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in Homeworld on Derme's Coffee

item.title: Level 19 - Homeworld Remastered
item.description: I have not been excited for a video game release for quite some time, but when this was announced I was excited. When I played the original Homeworld in 1999 I loved it, even though I could never get past the 6thmission at the time, it’s a game that’s stuck with me since. This game with the new engine is simply stunning. The visuals are incredible, the cut scenes are re-mastered and the sound quality is excellent.
